title: Instructional Design Based on Postpartum Hemorrhage (PPH) Management Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental obstetrics and gynecology knowledge and understanding of emergency response
context.additional_context: A practice-centered educational environment using smartphone-based VR simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can select and administer appropriate pharmacological treatment (uterotonic agents) within 5 minutes during postpartum hemorrhage (PPH)
Learners can assess patient status and collaborate with team members according to step-by-step protocols (Stages 1–3) in PPH scenarios
Through post-simulation self-assessment, learners can recognize potential errors in PPH management and develop improvement plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
